thread.title: 25 of Our Favorite IKEA Decor Finds Under $50 — Cheap Thrills
thread.title_full: 25 of Our Favorite IKEA Decor Finds Under $50 — Cheap Thrills

author: Arlyn Hernandez
title: 25 of Our Favorite IKEA Decor Finds Under $50 — Cheap Thrills
text:
Share 
There is no denying that furnishing and decorating a home is costly, so it can be easy to put it off indefinitely, all the while, you're living in a place you don't love or that isn't functional for you. Except, a little $$$ can go a long way if you know where to look (and you don't have to look too far.) IKEA is, of course, an amazing resource for unbelievably affordable tables, seating, lighting, textiles and beyond, and we feel confident guessing that there are many items in their vast catalog you've overlooked. From furniture to accessories for a finishing touch, these are our favorite 25 cheap finds, all under $50. (Image credit: IKEA ) Have some more thrilling yet cheap finds from IKEA (like the Ranarp floor lamp above, $44.99 ) up your sleeve? Share them below!
